title: Question About the Oppression Mastery!
body:
That mastery reduce the damage that you take from targets that have _**Stuns**_/Slows/Snares/etc!!

My question here how someone who is stunned gonna attack you?

replies.body:
DoT 

Sunfire Cape

Thornmail

Abilities with travel times.

So yes, if you stun a ziggs as his ult falls, it will do 3% less damage. 

This does not apply to true damage ({{summoner:14}})
They could have a persistent effect (like Mundo W or Sunfire cape), traps, or a projectile could be in the air when they get stunned.
